description:
Kazunari`s Father came with his son and Kotone to the Sinnoh region to help with a Johto Festa that Kotone was putting on.
He also ran a MooMoo Milk exhibit. Team Rocket stole a lot of the merchandise that he had and ate it.
He agreed to let Kotone and his son travel with Ash and his friends after Kotone asked permission to do so.
name: Kazunari no Chichiue
